DESCRIPTION: Shows the mentioned user or author squad profile
USAGE:
Track your squad account.
 Untrack your squad account. 
 Check someone elses squad account.
EXAMPLES:
**Track your account for first time;**```{{prefix}}profile STEAM64ID```
**See your stats;**```{{prefix}}profile```
**Re-Link Your Own Steam64ID;**```{{prefix}}profile re-link```
**Look for other players stats;**```{{prefix}}profile @Username#0001```
**(ADMIN ONLY) Re-link by Discord Profile;**```{{prefix}}profile re-link @Username#0001```
**(ADMIN ONLY) Re-link by Steam64ID (for dead Discord Accounts);**```{{prefix}}profile re-steam <STEAM64ID_HERE>```
TITLE: {{username}}'s profile
NO_BIO: No Bio || To set one: `{{prefix}}setbio <Your Bio>`||
SUCCESS: Profile is linked to your discord account successfully! Please wait while we fetch your data from the DataBase.
NOT_ENABLED: Squad Stats Track is not configured/enabled. Please run `add-sq` first if you are the owner of this server.
NOT_LOGGED: It seems that we don't know your steam account. Please login to our dashboard: {{dashboard}} and re-try after that!
NOT_LOGGED_TAG: <@{{user}}> didn't connect his account yet. To connect please log in to our dashboard; {{dashboard}}
